name: The Edge Of Space
description:
In the future humans have been forced to venture into the depths of space to find resources. On the very edges of the galaxy, you awaken after an accident to find the crew dead or gone after the ship's AI has become corrupted. Can you escape too?

Initially created for VimJam2 2021 - the theme was "On the Edge" and the requirement was "Boss".

Controls

Mouse and WASD - don't forget to use F for the flashlight!

Please Note

There is an occasional issue with the Windows build when the level loads that can make the OS think that the game is not responding - please persevere!
